Title: The Beat That My Heart Skipped
Writer: Jacques Audiard (scenario), Tonino Benacquista (scenario), James Toback (earlier screenplay: d'après le film "Fingers" écrit et réalisé par)
Actors: Romain Duris, Niels Arestrup, Jonathan Zaccaï, Gilles Cohen
Plot: Will Thomas still lead a life of crime and cruelty, just like his thuggish father, or will he pursue his dream of becoming a pianist?
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 19 wins & 11 nominations.
